activity.name: Acceptable Use of Data, IT and Social Media
activity.description:
This program is designed to help you understand the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the appropriate use of IT and social media at Bridgend College. 


With the increasing importance of data security and the widespread use of technology in our daily lives, it's essential that everyone has a clear understanding of these laws and guidelines. This training will provide you with the knowledge and skills needed to navigate the complex world of GDPR and use technology and social media in a responsible and ethical manner during your time at Bridgend College.
